scripts.predev: npm run wasm || echo 'Skipping wasm build (Rust toolchain missing)'
scripts.wasm:setup: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-bindgen-cli --version 0.2.92 --force
scripts.wasm: cd src/rust && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir ../../public/wasm --no-typescript target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/calc_wasm.wasm
scripts.wasm:dev: cd src/rust && cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir ../../public/wasm --no-typescript target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/calc_wasm.wasm
